pageContext.claim: “Financial Statements, from the time I announced I was going to run for President, showing all properties, assets and debts. It is a very IMPRESSIVE Statement, and also shows that I am the only President on record to give up my yearly $400,000 plus Presidential Salary!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's personal financial disclosure to the Federal Election Commission is detailed, but his tax returns would give a definitive and full account of how much he paid in taxes and the sources of his income.
